attributes.action: Make it illegal to demand the government stops the tide coming in. (Floods are not the responsibility of the Prime Minister, despite misconceptions)
attributes.additional_details:
The Government has suffered too long from people accusing it of not taking enough action to stop flooding.

How much control over the weather, and of the tide coming in, do people seriously think the Government really has?

Are they not like Canute?

It should be illegal, where seriously intended, to demand the government stops the tide coming in.
